thread.title: Pictures of Lisa Haydon flaunting her baby bump in a bikini has driven the Internet crazy
thread.title_full: Pictures of Lisa Haydon flaunting her baby bump in a bikini has driven the Internet crazy

title: Pictures of Lisa Haydon flaunting her baby bump in a bikini has driven the Internet crazy
text: Pictures of Lisa Haydon flaunting her baby bump in a bikini has driven the Internet crazy iTripTo Lisa Haydon More Trust Lisa Haydon to always be in the news for the coolest things. The sultry model and actor who took Bollywood by storm with her critically acclaimed performance in Queen has been ruling hearts with her confidence and panache. She has got admirers all across the globe and has become a youth icon in India where her personality is considered as unique and refreshing. We have been following her Instagram account and have been awed by her vacation photos from around the world. Not only does Lisa don the bikini look with great ease and style, she also shows the best ways to have fun on a vacation. Her pictures have been extremely inspiring and in each one of them, you can see how Lisa exudes the idea of owning up who who are. This time too Lisa has made heads turn by just being her happy, honest, uninhibited self. She recently posted some beach vacation pics flaunting her baby bump. As expected, the Internet cannot stop going gaga over these pictures, once again appreciating Lisa's personality, flamboyance and carefree, gypsy soul. ( ALSO SEE 12 hot photos of Lisa Haydon that prove she’s basically a beach bum! ) Have a look. That's pregnant Lisa having some beach time with a friend on Australia Day Lisa is always a sport! Having a blast with her friends She had announced her pregnancy to the world with this beautiful picture saying 'Humble beginnings' Look how happy and peaceful she looks in this one! NOW SEE Sonarika Bhadoria’s bikini photos are too hot to handle! Hot photos of Chitrashi Rawat show she is actually a gypsy at heart Have interesting travel photos you’d like to share with us? Send photos from your travels to travel@corp.india.com, don’t forget to mention where you’ve shot the picture and get a chance to be featured on our website! So what are you waiting for? Hurry!
